sect2.title: Resize Layers to Selection
sect2.para: The Resize Layers to Selection command resizes the selected layers to the boundary of the selection by removing any strips at the edge whose contents are all completely unselected. Areas which are partially selected (for example, by feathering) are not resized.
If there is no selection, this menu entry is disabled.

caption.para: On the left: before applying the command, the layer has a selection that has feathered edges.
On the right: after applying the command, the non-transparent pixels are not cropped, even if they are only semi-transparent.

listitem.para:
